meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be converted.
meanings.sent1: Her convertibleness made it easy for her to adapt to new situations.
meanings.sent2: The convertibleness of the currency allowed for easy exchange rates.
meanings.sent3: His convertibleness to different opinions made him a great team player.
meanings.sent4: The convertibleness of the material from solid to liquid amazed the scientists.
meanings.sent5: The convertibleness of the puzzle pieces made it fun to create different shapes.

meanings.definition: The ability to be changed or transformed into something else.
meanings.sent1: The convertibleness of the clay allowed the artist to mold it into various shapes.
meanings.sent2: The convertibleness of the fabric made it suitable for different types of clothing.
meanings.sent3: The magician's convertibleness of objects left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The convertibleness of the caterpillar into a butterfly is a fascinating process.
meanings.sent5: The convertibleness of the ingredients in the recipe allowed for easy substitutions.
